name: The Man In The Mountain
description:
Sound does not work in Web version, please download Windows version

A peaceful village  is being attacked by evil creatures.

You will not stand idly by! You will fight!!! You will help them!!

Prepare your base, repair the defenses, upgrade the houses and farms and fight.

Use your different weapons: rifle, shotgun and granade to repel the attack.  Drink coffee to get more energy.  Upgrade your weapons in the cave and fight.

Let's see if you can rescue this village.

We came up with the idea because we wanted to do a 2D game where you can aim and shoot. We made the prototype to test the mechanic.
